TopicTitle: is the website down for everyone?

Articles.Content: just tried going to the website and its failing for me. Anyone else having problems?

It's gone for me too... Ah, just checked, back again.

I'm guessing (pure guess only) that with .21 in experimental that the server may be under load whenever a new test version released to the experimental team?

3 times since two days ago. PS. Forum is normal.
